name: Nepal
fact: Home to Mount Everest, the highest peak on Earth.

name: India
fact: The Kumbh Mela festival is so large it’s visible from space.

name: South Korea
fact: Has one of the world’s highest internet speeds.

name: United States of America
fact: The U.S. has more tornadoes than any other country.

name: Portugal
fact: Lisbon is older than Rome and one of Europe’s oldest cities.

name: Egypt
fact: The Great Pyramid of Giza is the only surviving Wonder of the Ancient World.
